Name: Gain Ground™
About the game: The battle-simulation game has gone haywire! All contestants inside the system are trapped and frozen on the battlefields, and the androids are reprogrammed to become hi-tech killing machines! It's up to three brave fighters to rescue hostages, and to destroy the central computer of the system, the Brain.
Meta Title: Gain Ground™: Jun 1, 2010, SEGA and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Gain Ground™? Check out the release date (Jun 1, 2010), developer insights from SEGA, and a complete game summary.
